code: import React,{useState}from'react';import styles from'./SearchBar.module.css';import searchYelp from'../../utils/yelpApi';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=()=>{const SORTING_OPTIONS={'Best Match':'best_match','Highest Rated':'rating','Most Reviewed':'review_count'};const[term,setTerm]=useState('');const[location,setLocation]=useState('');const[sortOption,setsortOption]=useState(SORTING_OPTIONS['Best Match']);const[activeOption,setActiveOption]=useState(null);const handleTermChange=e=>{setTerm(e.target.value);};const handleLocationChange=e=>{setLocation(e.target.value);};const handleSortOptionChange=newOption=>{setsortOption(SORTING_OPTIONS[newOption]);setActiveOption(newOption);};const handleSearchButtonClick=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{const businesses=await searchYelp(term,location,sortOption);console.log(businesses);}catch(error){console.log(error);}};const renderSortByOptions=()=>{return Object.keys(SORTING_OPTIONS).map(sortingByOption=>{const isActive=sortingByOption===activeOption;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"".concat(styles.options," ").concat(isActive?styles.active:""),onClick:()=>handleSortOptionChange(sortingByOption),children:sortingByOption},SORTING_OPTIONS[sortingByOption]);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.searchBar,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:styles.filters,children:renderSortByOptions()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.inputs,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:styles.input,placeholder:"Search Businesses",onChange:handleTermChange,value:term}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:styles.input,placeholder:"Where?",onChange:handleLocationChange,value:location})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearchButtonClick,className:styles.go,children:"Let's go"})]});};export default SearchBar;
